outline.title: ChurnGuard AI: Strategic Business Plan
outline.summary: Title slide introducing the AI-powered customer churn prediction platform and capstone project details with student information.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/images/hero_ai_technology.png - Hero image showing AI/technology concept, suitable for a title slide about an AI-powered platform. Uses the presentation's color palette.

outline.title: Rubric Coverage - Assignment Framework
outline.summary: Comprehensive mapping of all five rubric criteria to specific sections of the business plan, demonstrating complete coverage of market analysis, use cases, impact assessment, monetization strategy, and financial planning requirements.

outline.title: Executive Summary - Market Opportunity
outline.summary: Overview of the $7 billion market opportunity in churn prediction and the compelling business case for ChurnGuard AI.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/images/market_growth.png - Image showing upward arrows and growth, which visually represents the market opportunity and projected growth of the $7 billion market.

outline.title: The Problem - Rising Costs & High Churn
outline.summary: Analysis of customer acquisition costs rising 60-75% and persistent high churn rates across industries.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/images/problem_costs.png - Image showing an upward trend with a warning sign and cost symbols, visually representing the problem of rising costs and high churn rates.

outline.title: The Solution - ChurnGuard AI Platform
outline.summary: Introduction to ChurnGuard AI's advanced ML-powered platform with 85%+ prediction accuracy and actionable insights.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/images/ai_platform.png - Image showing a dashboard with data, charts, and an 'AI' block, which is perfect for illustrating the ChurnGuard AI platform and its core capabilities.

outline.title: Market Analysis - Global Market Size
outline.summary: Detailed market sizing showing $7.08B market by 2033 with 17.2% CAGR across global regions.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/images/global_market.png - Global map with growth indicators, suitable for illustrating the global market size and regional growth rates.

outline.title: Market Analysis - Target Industries
outline.summary: Analysis of four high-churn industries (Telecom, Retail, BFSI, SaaS) representing $4+ billion opportunity.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/images/data_analytics.png - Chart-heavy image suitable for illustrating the industry comparison chart and market sizing data.

outline.title: Market Analysis - Competitive Landscape
outline.summary: Competitive positioning showing ChurnGuard AI's differentiation vs enterprise platforms and AI-first competitors.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/images/competitive_landscape.png - Image showing a matrix/quadrant, suitable for illustrating the competitive positioning matrix.

outline.title: Use Case 1 - Proactive Retention in Telecom
outline.summary: Real-world example of telecom provider reducing churn by 18% using ChurnGuard AI with $12M annual savings.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/images/telecom_use_case.png - Image showing communication towers and mobile devices, which is highly relevant to the telecommunications use case.

outline.title: Use Case 2 - Personalized Marketing in E-commerce
outline.summary: E-commerce platform increasing customer LTV by 34% through AI-driven customer segmentation and targeting.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/images/ecommerce_use_case.png - Image showing an e-commerce shopping cart and product icons, directly relevant to the e-commerce use case and personalized marketing.

outline.title: Use Case 3 - Product Development in SaaS
outline.summary: SaaS company identifying feature gaps causing 40% of churn and reducing churn by 45% through data-driven roadmap.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/images/saas_use_case.png - Image showing a cloud-based interface and user connection, suitable for representing a SaaS platform and product development analysis.

outline.title: Impact Assessment - Quantifiable Benefits
outline.summary: Comprehensive analysis of 300-500% ROI through reduced churn, increased LTV, and operational efficiency gains.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/images/financial_growth.png - Image showing various financial charts and a dollar sign, representing the quantifiable financial benefits and ROI.

outline.title: Impact Assessment - Implementation Challenges
outline.summary: Key challenges including data quality, model interpretability, change management, and technical integration solutions.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/images/challenges.png - Image showing a person navigating a path over obstacles, symbolizing the challenges and the path to success in implementation.

outline.title: Impact Assessment - Ethical Considerations
outline.summary: Framework for data privacy, algorithmic fairness, and transparency in AI operations with compliance measures.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/images/ethics_compliance.png - Image showing a shield, gavel, and checkmarks, representing the ethical framework, data privacy, and legal compliance.

outline.title: Monetization Strategy - Pricing Model
outline.summary: Tiered SaaS pricing (Starter $499, Professional $1,499, Enterprise custom) with additional revenue streams.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/images/pricing_strategy.png - Image showing currency symbols and a calculator/chart, suitable for illustrating the tiered subscription pricing model.

outline.title: Monetization Strategy - Revenue Model
outline.summary: SaaS business model with 85% gross margins, 12:1 LTV:CAC ratio, and strong unit economics.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/images/cash_flow.png - Image showing money flow, bar charts, and a pie chart, representing the revenue model and unit economics.

outline.title: Monetization Strategy - Sales & Go-to-Market
outline.summary: Multi-channel sales strategy combining digital marketing, inside sales, field sales, and strategic partnerships.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/images/sales_strategy.png - Image showing a funnel and growth charts, representing the multi-channel sales strategy and go-to-market approach.

outline.title: Monetization Strategy - Break-Even Analysis
outline.summary: Path to profitability within 30 months with detailed financial projections for Years 1-3.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/images/balance_sheet.png - Image showing a financial comparison chart, suitable for illustrating the break-even analysis of revenue vs. costs.

outline.title: Financial Plan - Funding Requirements
outline.summary: Seeking $500K seed funding with detailed use of funds across product, sales, infrastructure, and operations.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/images/funding_investment.png - Image showing a hand holding a growing plant and stacks of money, representing the funding requirement and investment growth.

outline.title: Financial Plan - Funding Sources
outline.summary: Diversified funding strategy targeting angel investors, venture capital, and strategic investors.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/images/customer_retention.png - Image showing a network of connected people, suitable for illustrating the diverse funding sources and investor network.

outline.title: Financial Plan - Three-Year Projections
outline.summary: Detailed 3-year financial summary showing path from $250K ARR (Year 1) to $3.5M ARR (Year 3).
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/images/success_metrics.png - Image showing a dashboard with multiple charts and gauges, suitable for illustrating the three-year financial projections and key metrics.

outline.title: Financial Plan - Revenue Drivers
outline.summary: Key assumptions driving revenue growth including customer acquisition, ARPA, retention, and pricing evolution.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/images/team_collaboration.png - Image showing a team collaborating around a growth arrow, representing the revenue drivers and the expanding sales team.

outline.title: Financial Plan - Cost Structure
outline.summary: Detailed cost breakdown showing operating leverage as revenue scales from $600K to $3.05M expenses.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/images/implementation_roadmap.png - Image showing a winding path with milestones, suitable for illustrating the implementation roadmap and phased approach.

outline.title: Financial Plan - Cash Flow Projections
outline.summary: Cash flow analysis showing path to positive cash flow by Month 30 with $850K cumulative funding requirement.

outline.title: Financial Plan - Balance Sheet Projections
outline.summary: Projected balance sheet showing strong financial position with minimal debt and growing cash reserves.

outline.title: Success Metrics - Customer KPIs
outline.summary: Customer-focused metrics including churn rate, NRR, health scores, satisfaction, and engagement indicators.

outline.title: Success Metrics - Financial KPIs
outline.summary: Financial metrics tracking growth efficiency, unit economics, profitability, and cash flow health.

outline.title: Success Metrics - Operational KPIs
outline.summary: Product and operational metrics including platform reliability, model performance, and team productivity.

outline.title: Implementation Roadmap - Phase 1 (Months 1-6)
outline.summary: Foundation phase focusing on MVP development, initial customer validation, and go-to-market preparation.

outline.title: Implementation Roadmap - Phase 2 (Months 7-12)
outline.summary: Growth phase emphasizing customer acquisition scaling, product enhancement, and customer success formalization.

outline.title: Implementation Roadmap - Phase 3 (Months 13-24)
outline.summary: Scale phase driving revenue growth to $1.2M ARR, Series A fundraising, and market expansion.

outline.title: Implementation Roadmap - Phase 4 (Months 25-36)
outline.summary: Maturity phase achieving profitability, market leadership, international expansion, and strategic options.

outline.title: Conclusion and Next Steps
outline.summary: Summary of investment highlights, call-to-action for investors and customers, and contact information.
